item.title: Report E-2024070024
item.description:
Report E-2024070024

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-05T18:14:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-20
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On June 20, 2024, one (1) 40-gallon drum of paint was damaged by a forklift and released approximately twenty (20) gallons of paint to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Lone Star Hazmat (LSH) to remediate the impacted site. LSH personnel overpacked the damaged drum in one (1) 95-gallon drum for disposal. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to collect all impacted material in one (1) additional 95-gallon drum for disposal.
